channel.title: Comments on: Happy Weekend: “It’s not about integration”, or isn’t it?
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Lens: An Ode to the Maybachufer | Collidoscope Berlin

item.description: […] World War II*. Kreuzberg’s dilapidated housing became home to guest workers, primarily from Turkey. The district soon came to be known as “Little Istanbul”. In 2014 you would still be […]
